description:
The ZoneKnit™ Long Sleeve Tee is icebreaker’s most breathable and lightweight active tee designed for running, biking and other high-exertion activities. This lightweight tee features ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh on the back and sleeves for enhanced breathability and temperature regulation when you’re on the move. Offset shoulder seams reduce friction when wearing a pack.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker ZoneKnit LS Tee - Mens

specs.value: 60% TENCEL™, 40% Merino Wool, - Exclusive of decoration
